dcterms:creator: Joshua A. Bull
Helen M. Byrne
dcterms:description: A two-dimensional, off-lattice agent-based model (ABM) of tumour-immune interactions that distinguishes macrophages, stromal, tumour, and necrotic cells, generating synthetic data to analyze the spatial and phenotypic heterogeneity in tumour-macrophage interactions.
dcterms:title: Bull and Byrne Model
